alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Fremont, Jefferson, northeastern Butte, northwestern Bonneville, west central Madison, southwestern Clark and northern Bingham Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Darlington to 9 miles southeast of Northwest Inl to 14 miles east of Southeast Inl. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rigby, Terreton, Ucon, Menan, Roberts, Lewisville, Mud Lake, Hamer, Northwest Inl, Monteview, Sage Junction, Osgood and Kettle Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Upper Snake River Plain
